page.title: Knauf
page.description: Distributor of waterproofing, concrete repair, gypsum and sealant materials such as Bostik, Knauf, Yoshino, Boral, Fibrin, Gripset, Shinetsu & Star Series

subtitle: Gypsum Board, Drywall Accessories, Frame
content: Knauf was founded in 1932 by the brothers Karl and Dr. Alfons N. Knauf. Today their sons, managing partners Nikolaus and Baldwin Knauf, steer the success of the corporations numerous enterprises in close coordination with the other family members. Knauf has a workforce of 23,000 in 40 countries, operating more than 150 production sites worldwide, all making a contribution to the group's success and, with it, their own economic security and personal development. Today Knauf is one of the world's leading manufacturers of building materials.

subsection2.title: Moistureshield
subsection2.subtitle: Gypsum board for high humidity areas
feature: Using special paper that can prevent mold growth
Special formula with low moisture absorption rate

subsection3.title: Denseshield
subsection3.subtitle: Ideal performance for impact resistance
feature: It has a high density and reinforced core which ensures the gypsum board can withstand impacts without being deformed or damaged
Both scratch-resistant coating paper and backpaper are designed to increase the overall strength and durability of the gypsum board.
Better fire resistance than standard gypsum board.

subsection4.title: Fireshield
subsection4.subtitle: Gypsum board with high fire resistance performance
subsection4.appearance: Pink face and grey back paper
feature: Higher fire resistance compared to standard gypsum board
Additional materials in the form of glass will maintain its strength in the event of a fire.

subsection1.title: 2 in 1 Cornice Compound
subsection1.subtitle: 2 in 1 Super Cornice Compound is a product made from Gypsum, with 2 functions in one formulation as a Cornice Adhesive application and can also be used as a Jointing Compound. 2 in 1 Cornice is the right formula for compounding jointing applications and has good adhesion as an adhesive or cornice adhesive.
feature: The formula does not crack when applied with Knauf Joint Tape
Has good and fine particle adhesion
One product for two applications of cornice adhesive, also Jointing Compound
Setting the time allows for neater workmanship
It's very easy to use as a connector for decorative elements and ceilings
Knauf 2 in 1 Cornice Compound manufactured to ASTM C475 standard

subsection2.title: Casting plaster
subsection2.subtitle: Knauf Casting Plaster is a high quality plaster product that is used for various applications such as making gypsum molds and decorating ceilings (cornices).
subsection2.usage: Print a list of gypsum profiles and other printed products
feature: It is a material that does not spread fire
Knauf Casting Plaster is manufactured according to ASTM C59 standard
